input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Balsam Hill Alpine Balsam Fir Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Carolina Pine Tree'
  - Name='Alcott Hill 7ft Unlit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree'
  - Name='Northlight Pencil Northern Balsam Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='7' Unlit Pink Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Norway Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='6 ft. Green Pre-Lit Carolina Pine PVC Artificial Christmas Tree with Pinecones and LED Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Feel Real Tiffany Fir Slim Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 12 ft. PowerConnect Dunhill Fir with Dual Color LED Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company 10 ft. PowerConnect Dunhill Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Dual Color LED Lights'
  - Name='Northlight 2' Medium Mixed Classic Pine Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Flip Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Kingswood Fir Hinged Pencil Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Kingswood Fir Pencil Hinged Tree'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm Carmel Pine Slim Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Sunnydaze Decor Slim and Stately Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 84'' Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Ophelia & Co. 6ft Unlit Snow-Dusted Full Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Hinged Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 6' Pencil Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 4' Northern Pine Medium Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Frontgate Grandinroad Christmas Norwood Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 7ft Unlit Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Alpine Balsam Fir Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand but similar type of artificial fir tree with realistic design, likely similar use and construction though details may differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Carolina Pine Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same company with a pine tree model instead of a fir; related category but different tree type and possibly different branch construction and fullness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Alcott Hill 7ft Unlit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar type of tree (Douglas Fir) and size close, unlit but artificial Christmas tree, similar functional category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Exact same product name and brand, presumably identical features as the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Pencil Northern Balsam Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir tree but pencil (narrow) style vs full body Dunhill Fir; less similar in silhouette and fullness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 7' Unlit Pink Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar size and type of tree but unlit and a colored (pink) variant, with possible stylistic differences reducing direct relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Norway Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand and tree species (spruce rather than fir), but still an artificial Christmas tree with likely similar uses and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6 ft. Green Pre-Lit Carolina Pine PVC Artificial Christmas Tree with Pinecones and LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial green pine tree similar height and with LED lights, though pine and added pinecones differentiate it somewhat.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Feel Real Tiffany Fir Slim Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and fir tree type but slim silhouette instead of full body, different branch design and possibly features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 12 ft. PowerConnect Dunhill Fir with Dual Color LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same model line (Dunhill Fir) and brand, but larger size and with dual color LED lights which is a feature upgrade over base model.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 10 ft. PowerConnect Dunhill Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Dual Color LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to above, same Dunhill Fir but larger size and advanced lighting, closely related but not identical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 2' Medium Mixed Classic Pine Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very small tree, pine species, unlit; quite different scale and type from Dunhill Fir full size tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Flip Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species (white spruce) and brand, but similar concept of realistic artificial Christmas tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Kingswood Fir Hinged Pencil Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, fir species, hinged branches but pencil (slim) style rather than full body, moderate similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Kingswood Fir Pencil Hinged Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Identical to above listing, same product style and brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm Carmel Pine Slim Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim artificial pine tree, different brand and species, less similar silhouette and branch style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sunnydaze Decor Slim and Stately Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim style artificial tree without species specified, likely differing silhouette and branch construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 84'' Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height (7 feet) and fir species artificial tree, likely similar functional purpose though fewer product details provided.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ophelia & Co. 6ft Unlit Snow-Dusted Full Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same size, full fir tree with unlit feature and snow-dusted finishing; close match in type and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Hinged Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Exact same model and brand with hinged branches, fully matching key features of the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 6' Pencil Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar size Fraser Fir but pencil (narrow) silhouette, different brand; moderate relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 4' Northern Pine Medium Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species (pine), smaller size (4 ft), less similar in scale and presence.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Frontgate Grandinroad Christmas Norwood Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand, likely high quality, artificial Christmas tree but species and exact features not specified; moderate similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 7ft Unlit Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar size spruce tree, unlit, different species but serving the same product category.
